citations.narrative:
On February 28, 2923, approximately at 8:00am, a six-year male Malayan tapir escaped from its primary enclosure by
jumping over the moat and into a staff parking lot; zoo was still closed to the public at this time. Zoo personnel
immediately responded implementing a successful capture plan; animal was safely darted and immobilized by a staff
veterinarian; tapir was secured and safely transported to its holding area. Handling of captured/immobilized animals must
be done as expeditiously and carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma, overheating, behavioral
stress, physical harm, or unnecessary discomfort. The facility must ensure the primary enclosure for Malayan tapirs is
structurally sound to prevent animals from escaping and from causing trauma and/or unnecessary stress/discomfort.
Correct by: None; this noncompliance was corrected prior to the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with two facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.131(b)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
On February 28, 2923, approximately at 8:00am, a six-year male Malayan tapir escaped from its primary enclosure by 
jumping over the moat and into a staff parking lot; zoo was still closed to the public at this time.  Zoo personnel 
immediately responded implementing a successful capture plan; animal was safely darted and immobilized by a staff 
veterinarian; tapir was secured and safely transported to its holding area.  Handling of captured/immobilized animals must 
be done as expeditiously and carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma, overheating, behavioral 
stress, physical harm, or unnecessary discomfort.  The facility must ensure the primary enclosure for Malayan tapirs is 
structurally sound to prevent animals from escaping and from causing trauma and/or unnecessary stress/discomfort.   
 
Correct by: None; this noncompliance was corrected prior to the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with two facility representatives. 
 
End Section
